pages.title: Mutant Zombie
pages.text: Naturally spawned $(key)Zombies$() have a small chance to mutate into a $(key)Mutant Zombie$().$(br)They can also be spawned manually via $(mage/spell#summon)Spell Summon$() or a $(key)Splash Potion of Chemical X$().$(br2)Defeating a $(key)Mutant Zombie$() drops the $(key)Hulk Hammer$().
